{{item.id}} {{item.name}} {{item.yearOfBirth}}
Details
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Author } from 'src/app/Models/Author' import { AuthorService } from '../../Services/AuthorService'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authors', templateUrl: './authors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authors.component.css'] }) export class AuthorsComponent { authors: Array = [] constructor(private http: HttpClient, private authorService: AuthorService) { } ngOnInit() { this.authorService.getAuthors().subscribe(authors => { this.authors = authors; }); } deleteAuthor(id: string) { let author: Author; this.authorService.getAuthor(id).subscribe(t => author = t); this.authorService.deleteAuthor(id); this.authors = this.authors.filter(author => author.id !== id) } }
